18–22 August 2023 • Adelaide Convention Centre

PyCon AU is back!

PyCon AU 2023 will be held in the Adelaide Convention Centre, on the bank of the Karawirra Parri / Torrens River in Tarndanya / Adelaide between 18–22 August 2023.

We'll have lots more information on this website over the coming months, but to find out more as it happens you can subscribe to our mailing list:
